=Tivo.Hme.Host.IHmeConnectionSyncronizationInfo=
 Provides access to the names of the connection events used in syncronization. 
==Properties==
|| *Property Name* || *Description* ||
|| CommandReceivedName ||  The name of the event that is set when HME commands are ready to be sent.  ||
|| EventReceivedName ||  The name of the event that is set when HME events are received.  ||
